discussion.content: Normalization is a process of reorganizing data to maintain consistency

Selected Answer: B
Based on HAM fundamentals on demand, Trustworthy chapter: "Normalization: Process of reorganizing data in a database so that there are no inconsistencies in data, no redundancy of data, and all related items are stored together."

Selected Answer: B
Page 58 of Vancouver text
It should be B, as Normalization is a process of restructuring a relation in a database to eliminate redundancy and improve data integrity.
